definition: tree trunk/main part of sth/to manage/to work/to do/capable/cadre/to kill (slang)/to fuck (vulgar)
What (noble errand) brings you here?/May I help you?/What can I do for you?

sentences.english: Good evening, sir. What can I do for you?
sentences.chinese: 晚上好，先生，您有何貴幹？

sentences.english: What are you doing here, apart from the obvious?
sentences.chinese: 除了表面上這點事兒，你來這兒到底有何貴幹？

sentences.english: What have you come here for?
Oh, Brick, what do you want?
Glad to meet you. What are you going to America for?
sentences.chinese: 很高興認識你。你去美國有何貴幹？

sentences.english: The guards looked down from the battlements and asked us our business.
sentences.chinese: 守衛從城垛中俯視我們，並詢問我們有何貴幹。

sentences.english: What are you going to America for?
